original_text: As Jesus was teaching the people, he said, ‘Be careful not to do the same as the teachers of God's Law. They want people to think that they are important. So they walk about in beautiful long clothes. They like people to praise them in the market place.
korean_text: 예수께서 가르치실 때에 이르시되 긴 옷을 입고 다니는 것과 시장에서 문안 받는 것과

sentences.original_text: As Jesus was teaching the people
Be careful not to do the same
as the teachers of God's Law
They want people to think that they are important
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 자신들이 중요하다고 사람들이 생각하게 하고 싶어한다

sentences.original_text: So they walk about in beautiful long clothes
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그들은 아름다운 긴 옷을 입고 돌아다닌다

sentences.original_text: They like people to praise them
